{% verbatim %}

JavaScript Class

JavaScript Class

The ActionInvoker class is responsible for handling the front-end logic of the module.

new ActionInvoker(config)

The config object should include:

  • event: The event to listen for
  • action: The action to perform
  • targetId: The ID of the target element
  • strategy: The strategy for selecting elements (optional, default: "this")
  • bindedId: The ID of the element to bind the event to (optional)
  • fireOnce: Whether the action should only fire once (optional, default: false)
{% endverbatim %} July 11, 2024, 7:44 a.m.
